question: Consider the following statements about Indian Ocean Naval Symposium (IONS). 1.It was launched by India in 2012. 2.It works to ensure speedy response to requirements of Humanitarian Assistance and Disaster Relief (HADR) in the IOR. 3.It is a voluntary initiative. Which of the above is correct regarding IONS?
explanation: The Indian Ocean Naval Symposium (IONS) is an inclusive and voluntary initiative that brings together navies of littoral states of the Indian Ocean Region. It was launched by India in February 2008.
